text: Alvin Sargent (April 12, 1927 - May 9, 2019) was an American screenwriter. He won two Academy Awards in 1978 and 1981 for his screenplays of Julia and Ordinary People. Sargent died on May 9, 2019 in Seattle, Washington at the age of 92. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Academy Award winning writers Category:1927 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American screenwriters Category:Writers from Philadelphia
title: Alvin Sargent
